int fbtrack (IplImage *imgI, IplImage *imgJ, float *bb, float *bbnew, float *scaleshift)

Function Documentation

int fbtrack ( IplImage *  imgI,
IplImage *  imgJ,
float *  bb,
float *  bbnew,
float *  scaleshift 
)

Calculate the bounding box of an Object in a following Image. Imgs aren't changed.

Parameters:
imgI Image contain Object with known BoundingBox
imgJ Following Image.
bb Bounding box of object to track in imgI. Format x1,y1,x2,y2
scaleshift returns relative scale change of bb
